title: How to Play a DVD on Xbox One

steps.headline: Press the Xbox Home button.
steps.description: It's the button that has the Xbox logo in the center of the controller. This will take you to the home screen.

steps.headline: Select Store.
steps.description: It's the last tab at the top of the screen. Navigate to it using your controller and press A to select it.

steps.headline: Select Search.
steps.description: It's the tab that has a magnifying glass at the top of the screen.

steps.headline: Type Blu-ray in the search bar.
steps.description: Use your controller to select the letters on the screen.

steps.headline: Press the Menu button.
steps.description: It's the button that has an image of three vertical lines. It's in the center-right of the controller. This will display a list of matching apps.

steps.headline: Select the Blu-ray Player app.
steps.description: It's the app that has a blue icon with the Blu-ray Disc logo.

steps.headline: Select Install.
steps.description: It's below the image of the Blu-ray logo on the app's main page. This will install the Blu-ray Player app that will allow you to watch DVD's and Blu-rays on your XBox One.

steps.headline: Insert DVD or Blu-ray into XBox One.
steps.description: The disk drive is the black slit on the front-left side of the XBox One console. The Blu-ray Player app will launch automatically and play the DVD or Blu-ray.
